txt.en: While scouring Thornhope for survivors, you discovered goblins from Moria pressed into the service of Mordor and the White Hand.\n\nYou should defeat some of the goblins.
While scouring Thornhope for survivors, you discovered goblins from Moria pressed into the service of Mordor and the White Hand.
Goblins can be found at Thornhope in the Entwash Vale.\n\nYou should defeat as many goblins as possible to help satiate BÃ©ortnoth's thirst for revenge.
